content: शंकर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (रा --री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [शं सुखं करोति कृ-अच्] Conferring happiness or prosperity, auspicious, propitious. --रः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a celebrated teacher and author; see App. II. --री {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Pārvatī, wife of Śiva. {@--2@} Bengal madder. {@--3@} The Śamī tree.
